column9: Security at the door are trash. I showed up to meet some friends and asked if I could go straight in (empty line). The two bouncers made me walk through these empty barricades in front of this small, standard bar, as if I were entering...More

column7: Quick shot and then some sushi
column9: I really lime this place. They, just as the name implies, have shots which are very nice. They also have great sushi to eat there or take home.
Fantastic visit at the Shotluckan in Halmstad. The bartender mixed two sour H2SO4 shots to us. They were excellent. We felt like to university students again.

This is not a bar that you want to hang out in for a whole evening but a quick visit can be fun. The shots are very innovative and the making/serving is a show in itself. Drop in for a couple of shots before you...More

column7: Great shots but mor interesting the best Sushi in town!!!
column9: Came here to try their shots, which are both nice and imaginative. But more surprising is that they serve if not the best then very close to the best sushi in town!

Fun to try some of the weird shots they've come up with. But the place is often packed and seating very limited, meaning you just stand there waiting for 10 minutes, order, drink your shot, then back to waiting. Not really an environment for hanging...More
An unusual experience. Cheep shots that ain't that strong. Which is good, you don't go here to get drunk but to experience the story behind the shots. Great show!
